title.en: Passover: Rescue Through the Blood of a Lamb

en: God rescues His people from slavery.
A lamb’s blood becomes a sign of protection.

lines: Each household was to take a lamb—without defect.
The lamb was sacrificed and eaten as a family meal.
The blood was placed as a sign on the home.
Judgment passed over where the sign was present.

question.en: Why do you think God chose a lamb and a sign of blood for this rescue?
